STI.P: List of reference standards and specifications referred to in Article 3

CONTENTS.P: Providers of qualified electronic attestations of attributes and providers of electronic attestation of attributes issued by or on behalf of a public sector body responsible for an authentic source shall issue their attestations to natural or legal persons according to the specifications for trust service providers established in standard ETSI EN 319 401 v3.1.1 (2024-06) (ETSI EN 319 401).
